page.title: 02 TOURISM
page.content: {The air, the hills, Elgar and peace {and quiet}attract most tourists to Malvern.The Abbey Hotel is the largest hotel in Malvern,and most expensive so most tourists tend to go to cheaper bed and breakfast places. More elderly people come to Malvern than younger people.The elderly people like the fresh air especially if they come from larger cities like Birmingham and they like the peace and quiet.The younger tourists like walking on the hills. Foreigners,especially Americans come to Malvern because of Elgar and when they get to Malvern they discover the hills also,to their delight. Mr.Cresswell,the Tourist Information manager trys to get tourists to Malvern and then he arranges entertainment for them.The number of visitors is more than double the town's population.
